description: This file defines a React functional component named QuotePanel that fetches and displays a motivational quote from a backend API endpoint. It manages state for the quote and error messages, and provides a button to refresh the quote.

methods.name: QuotePanel()
methods.description: React component that displays a motivational quote by fetching from the backend.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Asynchronous function that attempts to fetch a quote from the API and updates component state accordingly.

calls: setErr('Unable to load quote right now.')
